name: A Series of Temporal Mishaps
storyline: A Series of Temporal Mishaps is an ever-growing first-person platformer set in distinct eras of earth's history. Travel through time and overcome platforming obstacles to reach each era's objective...while making more than a couple mistakes along the way.
summary: A Series of Temporal Mishaps is a platformer set in 4 distinct eras of earth's history. Travel through time, steal the secrets of the ages, and run, jump, and puzzle your way home. The only catch: you're not very good at time-traveling.
